page.title: 05LOXLEY SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in 1911. There are 8 classrooms a library, staffroom, cloakrooms, and stockrooms. We have a playing field and a playground with logs, tunnels and a sandpit. There are 196 children in our school aged 4 to 11 years. There are four computers, tape recorders and a video camera. We do Maths, English, Art, Topic, Games, Handwriting and Group Work. In the classrooms the desks are arranged in groups so that 4 or 6 children sit together. Classes visit museums, farms, environmental centres and other places connected with the work they are doing. A group of children are learning to play string instruments and many of the children play recorders. There are clubs for, cooking, sewing, science, gardening, art and Scripture Union.
